name: Speech Segmentation
descr: Perform full process of speech segmentation: text normalization, phonetization, alignment and RMS. Requires audio and orthographic transcription.

options.text: Input file pattern with time-aligned tokens.
Output file pattern with time-aligned phonemes and RMS.
Attempt to predict short pauses after each word (Experimental).
Output is a simplified JSON file instead of an annotated file.
